message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product for $120. I believe it will be very valuable for you.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $90. Would you be willing to sell it to me for that price?
I appreciate your interest, Bob.  While $120 is my ideal price, I could be persuaded to go down to $110. This product is truly worth it.
I understand you think the product is worth a lot, but I'm still not convinced it's worth $110. I'd be willing to pay $95 for it. Can you meet me in the middle?
